column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Were you surprised ?
#Text=Kuvira controls the whole nation now , and Republic City is begging for the metal that we 're mining .
#Text=This train has left the station , and we own the track !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Now that 's a nice looking hunk of spirit vine !
#Text=Let 's take it back to the lab and get it stabilized immediately .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You look worried , Bolin .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , well , I just have some misgivings about how you kind of ambushed Tenzin and the other leaders .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You believe in the work that we 've done for the people of the Earth Empire , right , Bolin ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I do , but ... " Kuvira says : " Then stick with me .
#Text=I 'm going to need your help now more than ever .
#Text=Raiko and the other leaders want to bully us into accepting some idiot king who will serve them but neglect the people .
#Text=We have to stand strong against them .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm just not sure about this whole " Empire " thing .
#Text=It seems pretty aggressive .
#Text=And what was that part about the crushing ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " That was just some ... tough rhetoric to let people know that we mean business .
#Text=Believe me , conflict is the last thing I want .
#Text=Will you help me make history , Bolin ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'll stand by you .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Thank you .
#Text=" Suyin says : " We need to talk .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Can you give us the room , please ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " I met with the world leaders , and I 've come as their representative .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " So now you 're taking an interest in world affairs .
#Text=A little late , is n't it ?
#Text=When the queen fell , and everyone was asking you to help keep the Earth Kingdom from falling apart , all you wanted to do was hide in Zaofu , and let others deal with the consequences .
#Text=" Suyin says : " That 's hardly fair .
#Text=I did n't want to seize power for myself , which is what you 've done .
#Text=I 'm telling you for the good of everyone , you have to step down .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I stepped up .
#Text=I provide stability and equality .
#Text=Tell your world leaders to stay out of Earth Empire business .
#Text=We wo n't accept their hand - picked dictator .
#Text=" Suyin says : " What makes you so different ?
#Text=You 're just another tyrant .
#Text=And do n't pretend the people put you where you are .
#Text=I know what happens to cities who do n't want to hand over control to you .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Then you know what 's coming for Zaofu .
#Text=" Wu says : " First I lose my suite , then I lose my throne .
#Text=My royal brooch is a lie !
#Text=I know you must be crushed , not getting to come back to Ba Sing Se with me .
#Text=" Mako says : " Do n't worry about me .
#Text=I 'll ... find a way to make it .
#Text=" Wu says : " Good ol' Mako , my big tough guy .
#Text=Okay .
#Text=I just have to go on , move forward , take decisive action .
#Text=Let 's go shopping !
#Text=" Wu says : " Ugh .
#Text=Get rid of him .
#Text=He 's with her .
#Text=" Mako says : " He 's my brother .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Interesting ceremony , huh ?
#Text=" Mako says : " You are n't going to keep working for Kuvira now that she 's going against the wishes of the entire world , are you ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " You do n't understand .
#Text=Kuvira is helping out all the poor people of the Earth Empire .
#Text=People like our family .
#Text=This is for the best .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know , bro .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Okay , why do n't you come with me , and you 'll see for yourself ?
#Text=We 've done a lot of good , and Varrick is working on some new innovations .
#Text=We 're making history .
#Text=" Mako says : " By " crushing " anyone who gets in your way ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " That was just some tough rhetoric to let the people know that we mean business .
#Text=I mean , Kuvira is basically just like Korra .
#Text=She might seem hard to deal with , but just because she 's so passionate and believes in what she 's doing .
#Text=" Mako says : " It seems like she 's just a dictator who 's taking the Earth Kingdom by force .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , okay , you think your new best friend in there would be a better leader than Kuvira ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , no , but still ... " Bolin says : " Still what ?
#Text=Come on , Mako !
#Text=I 'm making a difference out there , what are you doing , huh ?
#Text=You 're just some glorified butler for some snotty rich bozo !
#Text="
